actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Information Policy, Census, and National Archives.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Information Policy, Census, and National Archives

official_title: To preclude individuals who have a pending charge or have been convicted of a crime from serving as enumerators for the collection of census data.
subjects: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

summary.text: Prohibits an individual who has a pending charge or has been convicted of a crime (other than a minor traffic offense) from serving as an enumerator for the collection of census data. Exempts any individual who holds an enumerator position as of the date of this Act's enactment.

titles.title: To preclude individuals who have a pending charge or have been convicted of a crime from serving as enumerators for the collection of census data.
To preclude individuals who have a pending charge or have been convicted of a crime from serving as enumerators for the collection of census data.
